title: My ping issues
body: So for the past year I have had the same internet every week, every day, every game, i sit at a solid 40-50 ping, but for the past week NONSTOP i have had solid 150-200 ping, and it just sits in that ping, every time i play a game, I restart my computer and the problem goes away for about an hour then proceeds to continue, I have no clue what it is, and its not just one Internet router, I have gone over to my dads house and my little brother there has a really good gaming speed router that gives me like solid 30 ping all day every day and this last weekend I went over there and still had the 150-200 ping problem, its not my router, ive cleaned my laptop, theres nothing open in my task manager causing it, I'm just really lost and have looked over my computer dozens of times and cannot find a solution to the problem, I'm hoping someone can please help. {{champion:143}}

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like this may be isolated to your PC, given your context. This means the culprit is most likely a local network configuration on your PC, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are fine.

Let me know if this caused any change.
Same issue. Games are so aggravating to play. Not happy
